publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3484 Mr Andrew Welsh: Angus Youth Congressâ€”That the Parliament congratulates the Angus Youth Congress for its role in encouraging young people to become active citizens and, in so doing, play an active and constructive role in the democratic decision-making process; notes that a conference will take place on 11-13 October 2002 in which 70 delegates from Angus will meet in Dunoon to discuss the way forward for their organisation; looks forward to the outcome of the conference, and wishes the delegates every success in continuing to promote the voice of young people throughout the Angus Council area.Supported by: Brian Adam*
S1M-3484 Angus Youth Congress (lodged on 10 October 2002) Stewart Stevenson*, Andrew Wilson*, Alex Neil*, Michael Matheson*, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-3484 Angus Youth Congress (lodged on 10 October 2002) Shona Robison*
S1M-3484 Angus Youth Congress (lodged on 10 October 2002) Christine Grahame*, Tommy Sheridan*, Fergus Ewing*
S1M-3484 Angus Youth Congress (lodged on 10 October 2002) Donald Gorrie*
S1M-3484 Angus Youth Congress (lodged on 10 October 2002) Mr Gil Paterson*
S1M-3484 Angus Youth Congress (lodged on 10 October 2002) Mr Kenneth Gibson*
